channel.title: AMS Council Agenda Feed
channel.description: A feed that parses the agendas for AMS Council

item.title: Council Agenda – July 23, 2025 at 6:00 PM
item.content:encoded:
AMS Council Meeting

Alma Mater Society of UBC Vancouver

Wednesday, July 23, 2025 at 6:00 PM PDT to Wednesday, July 23, 2025 at 10:00 PM

PDT

Michael Kingsmill Forum + Zoom for Councillors (must be pre-arranged with the President): https://ubc.zoom.us/j/61361551422?pwd=WDhIblhkNEVEcFIyT1lsMjhBc0tSQT09

Meeting Details: https://ubc.zoom.us/j/67159029217?pwd=gC09KpyYLXdpwG3aCLvwMoh30huCs7.1

Meeting ID: 613 6155 1422

Passcode: 968875

Additional Meeting Details: Join Zoom Meeting: https://ubc.zoom.us/j/67159029217?pwd=gC09KpyYLXdpwG3aCLvwMoh30huCs7.1

Meeting ID: 671 5902 9217

Passcode: 947251

One tap mobile:

+17789072071,,67159029217#,,,,,,0#,,947251#

Dial by your location:

+1 613 209 3054 (Vancouver)

+1 778 907 2071 (Montreal)

+1 204 272 7920 (Alberta)

+1 438 809 7799 (Ottawa)

+1 587 328 1099 (Toronto)

+1 647 374 4685 (Manitoba)

Meeting ID: 671 5902 9217

Passcode: 947251

Join from a videoconferencing system:

IP: 159.124.196.25 (Canada Vancouver) or 159.124.168.213 (Canada Toronto)

Meeting ID: 671 5902 9217

Passcode: 947251

SIP: 67159029217@vn.zmca.us

Passcode: 947251

Agenda

I. Call to Order 6:00 PM

Councillors: Please complete the ongoing COI disclosure survey (linked and visible under Actions in OnBoard) prior to participating in the meeting.

Meeting will be called to order by 6:10 PM at the latest.

II. Territorial Acknowledgement 6:10 PM

III. Approval of the Agenda

"BE IT RESOLVED THAT the agenda be adopted as presented."

A. Agenda Amendment

Agenda additions:

• Executive Performance and Accountability Committee minutes

• Executive Performance and Accountability Committee goals

Proposed motion:

"BE IT RESOLVED THAT the agenda be amended as presented"

IV. Membership and Attendance: Introductions, New Members, Declaration of Vacancies

A. New Members

B. Vacancies

GSS, Medicine, Affiliates

C. Goodbyes

V. Speaker's Business and Remarks

VI. Statements from Students-at-Large 6:12 PM

Statement from student-at-large - 3 minutes

Response from Councillors - 3 minutes

Closing remarks from student-at-large - 1 minute

Note: Up to three students at large may address Council.

VII. Approval of Minutes of Council and Committees

Proposed motion:

"WHEREAS Council on July 2, 2025 approved Council minutes dated March 12, 2025 which recorded the VP Finance as being Gagan Parmar when the VP Finance at the time was still Amber Dhaliwal. BE IT RESOLVED THAT Council approve the corrected version of the March 12 Council minutes as presented."

Note: Requires 2/3rds

Proposed motion:

BE IT RESOLVED THAT the following minutes be accepted as presented:

Minutes of the Executive Committee dated June 24, 2025

Minutes of the Executive Committee dated July 2, 2025

Minutes of Presidents Council dated October 17, 2023

Minutes of Presidents Council dated May 28, 2024

Minutes of Presidents Council dated July 18, 2024

Minutes of Presidents Council dated August 26, 2024

Minutes of Presidents Council dated October 3, 2024

Minutes of Presidents Council dated December 13, 2024

Minutes of Presidents Council dated January 20, 2025

Minutes of Presidents Council dated February 28, 2025

Minutes of Presidents Council dated May 25, 2025

Minutes of AMS Council dated March 26, 2025

Finance Committee minutes dated June 25, 2025

Finance Committee minutes dated July 2, 2025

Student Life Caucus minutes dated June 26, 2025

AMS In Camera Council minutes

To view the in camera minutes contact Sheldon (archives@ams.ubc.ca)

March 26, 2025

VIII. Consent Items

A. Consent Items Requiring a Simple Majority

B. Consent Items Requiring a Two-Thirds Majority

IX. Presentations and Accompanying Motions

A. Academic Experience Survey Report 2025 6:21 PM

Presenter: Zarifa Nawar

Presentation period: 25 minutes

Question period: 5 minutes

Presentation will be attached prior to the release of the public agenda

B. Workday Student Survey Report 6:51 PM

Presenter: Zarifa Nawar

Presentation period: 20 minutes

Question period: 5 minutes

Presentation will be attached prior to the release of the public agenda

C. Funds & Fees Report 2024-2025 7:16 PM

Presenter: Gagan Parmar

Presentation period: 20 minutes

Question period: 5 minutes

Presentation will be attached prior to the release of the public agenda

X. Executive and Committee Motions

A. Code Change re Agenda Circulation 7:41 PM

Presenters: Sarah Wong, Riley Huntley

Proposed motion:

From the Governance Committee

"BE IT RESOLVED THAT Council adopt the report from the Governance Committee entitled 'Code Changes 2025: Agenda Circulation' and thus amend the Code as recommended."

Note: Requires 2/3rds

B. Code Change re Constituency Representatives 7:44 PM

Presenters: Sarah Wong, Riley Huntley

From the Governance Committee

"BE IT RESOLVED THAT Council adopt the report from the Governance Committee entitled 'Code Changes 2025: Constituency Representatives' and thus amend the Code as recommended."

Note: Requires 2/3rds

C. Code Change re Q4 7:47 PM

Presenters: Sarah Wong, Gagan Parmar

From the Governance Committee

"BE IT RESOLVED THAT Council adopt the report from the Governance Committee entitled 'Code Changes 2025: Q4' and thus amend the Code as recommended."

Note: Requires 2/3rds

D. Advisory Board 7:50 PM

Presenters: Sarah Wong, Riley Huntley

From the Governance Committee

"BE IT RESOLVED THAT Council adopt the report from the Governance Committee entitled 'Code Changes 2025: Advisory Board' and thus amend the Code as recommended. BE IT FURTHER RESOLVED THAT Council approve the new policy GV6 entitled Advisory Board."

Note: Requires 2/3rds

E. Financial Strategist JD 7:55 PM

Presenters: Mya Tsai, Gagan Parmar

From the Human Resources Committee

"BE IT RESOLVED THAT the Financial Strategist job description be accepted as presented."

F. Finance Committee Goals 7:58 PM

Presenter: Gagan Parmar

From the Finance Committee

"BE IT RESOLVED THAT the Finance Committee goals be approved as presented"

G. Executive Performance and Accountability Committee Goals 8:01 PM

Presenter: Jasper Lorien

From the Executive Performance and Accountability Committee

"BE IT RESOLVED THAT the Executive Performance & Accountability Committee goals be approved as presented"

XI. Constituency and Affiliate Motions

XII. Discussions and Consultation

XIII. President's Business and Remarks 8:04 PM

Presenter: Riley Huntley

Updates - 5 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

XIV. Executive Business and Remarks

A. VP Academic & University Affairs 8:09 PM

Presenter: Zarifa Nawar

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

B. VP Administration 8:12 PM

Presenter: Dylan Evans (he/him/his)

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

C. VP External Affairs 8:15 PM

Presenter: Solomon Yi-Kieran

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

D. VP Finance 8:18 PM

Presenter: Gagan Parmar

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

E. VP Student Life 8:21 PM

Presenter: Kevin Heieis

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

F. Managing Director 8:24 PM

Presenter: Justin Lieu

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

G. Senior Manager of Student Services 8:27 PM

Presenter: Kathleen Simpson

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

XV. Committee Reports (3 minutes each)

A. Building Operations Committee 8:30 PM

Presenter: Dylan Evans (he/him/his)

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

B. Clubs and Societies Committee 8:33 PM

Presenter: Dylan Evans (he/him/his)

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

C. Events Committee 8:36 PM

Presenter: Humleen Samra

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

D. External Briefs and Communications Committee 8:39 PM

Presenter: Solomon Yi-Kieran

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

E. Finance Committee 8:42 PM

Presenter: Gagan Parmar

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

F. Governance Committee 8:45 PM

Presenter: Sarah Wong

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

G. Human Resources Committee 8:48 PM

Presenter: Mya Tsai

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

H. Executive Performance and Accountability Committee (EPA) 8:51 PM

Presenter: Jasper Lorien

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

XVI. Report from Presidents' Council 8:54 PM

Presenter: Riley Huntley

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

XVII. Board of Governors, Senate, & Ombudsperson Reports

A. Board of Governors

Presenters: Cade Desjarlais, Jasper Lorien

B. Senate

Presenters: Zarifa Nawar, Jasper Lorien

C. Ombudsperson

Presenter: Noah Mossey

XVIII. Historical Update 8:57 PM

Presenter: Sheldon Goldfarb

XIX. Other Business, Including In Camera Discussions, Notices of Motions and Submissions

A. In Camera Session

1. Lobbying Motion - UBCx 9:07 PM

Presenter: Solomon Yi-Kieran

Presentation time: 15 minutes

Question period: 5 minutes

2. Advocacy Partnership Agreement 9:27 PM

Presenter: Solomon Yi-Kieran

3. Executive Performance and Accountability - Monthly Session 9:35 PM

Presenter: Jasper Lorien

XX. Next Meeting and Adjournment

Next Council meeting time and date: 6:00 pm on August 20, 2025.

Supporting Documents
